title: [Gameplay] (visual) Ashe E particle bug Hawkshot
body:
Major visual error with Ashe's Hawkshot as shown in video. Confirmed with audio that others were seeing the error also, not just myself. Gragas can be heard saying that he sees the particle error on his screen also. The best full visual of exactly what's going on can be seen in the last 40 seconds of the video.
Full video can be found here : http://www.twitch.tv/tornvenom/b/599651886

replies.body: We're working on fixing this. Thanks so much for the report! :D
